let express = require('express');
let loadware = require('loadware');
 
let join = (...middles) => {
  let router = express.Router();
  loadware(middles).forEach(middle => {
    router.use(middle);
  });
  return router;
}
 
 
// TODO: allow concatenation of some as `status()`

}
